snippet: The Obama administration said that Secretary of State John Kerry would fly to Vienna to assess whether a deal is possible in talks on Iran’s nuclear activities.
abstract: Obama administration announces that Sec of State John Kerry will head to Vienna to assess whether deal is possible in talks on Iran's nuclear activities.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said that Secretary of State John Kerry would fly to Vienna to assess whether a deal is possible in talks on Iran’s nuclear activities.

headline.main: Kerry to Join Talks on Iran as Deadline Draws Near
headline.print_headline: Kerry to Join Talks on Iran as Deadline Draws Near
